fields.name: EnabledState
fields.description: Whether to enable health probes to be made against backends defined under backendPools. Health probes can only be disabled if there is a single enabled backend in single enabled backend pool.

fields.name: HealthProbeMethod
fields.description: Configures which HTTP method to use to probe the backends defined under backendPools.

fields.name: IntervalInSeconds
fields.description: The number of seconds between health probes.

fields.name: Path
fields.description: The path to use for the health probe. Default is /

fields.name: Protocol
fields.description: Protocol scheme to use for this probe
